: : Darkangel : :
The bat bot was both flattered and angered by DeathSteel's words. Did he thin him unloyal?
Darkangel: Squander? I think not. I have no wish to join the Predacons..., a dieing faction of Transformers. I serve the Tripredacus. If you were smart you would be with us. We rule Cybertron, and will eventually win this war. Then we will be the rulers of all Transformers.
 "raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...>" <raccoon7679@...> wrote:DeathSteel::

He smiled at the bold brass this bot had.  He lowered his shoulder 
blasters and folded them back into his shoulder compartment. Though 
he appeared to have disarmed himself, DeathSteel was no fool. He had 
his optic lazars still focused on the bot's head, just in case. He 
chose a more charismatic approach in trying to induct the bot into 
his new pack of predacons. " You are a very brave bot Darkangel. I 
like that in a warrior bot. Yess, you have the prestige of a 
leader.  I can see this about you. Perhaps we can make arrangements 
then. I am DeathSteel. Leader of the Predacons. And I can use a 
great bot like you. The rewards will be great if you join me."  He 
stretched out his dragon wings though in bot mode and then refolded 
them behind his back. "Hmmm, yess, you will rule over many and be 
feared. I can use you if you so chose. Are you up to the challange 
of being great? Or would you rather squander your talents elsewhere?"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : :
> Darkangel comes down in front of DeathSteel, transforming.
> Darkangel: I am Darkangel of the Tripredacus. Now what about you?
